alfredsnippet.snippet:
Halton Arp, What has science come to? Journal of Scientific Exploration, Vol. 14, No. 3, 2000, p.448

"Of course science claims to be based on facts and that contending theories must rise and fall as new evidence emerges, but the changes tend to be extravagantly hyped variations based on the same unquestioned basic assumptions."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Arp on Unquestioned Basic Assumptions
